calculations.formula: COUNT(all rows in ACME.xlsx)
calculations.details: Total number of rows in the dataset

calculations.formula: COUNT(all columns)
COUNT(responses WHERE zip_code IN austin_zips)
calculations.details: Filtered using list of 54 valid Austin zip codes

calculations.formula: COUNT(DISTINCT zip_codes WHERE zip IN austin_zips)
calculations.details: Number of different Austin zip codes represented

calculations.formula: MODE(zip_codes)
calculations.details: Zip code with most survey responses

calculations.formula: TOP(5, COUNT(zip_code) GROUP BY zip_code)
calculations.details: Five zip codes with highest response counts

calculations.formula: MEAN(TextBlob.sentiment.polarity for all text responses)
calculations.details: Average polarity across 1182 analyzed responses (-1 to 1 scale)

calculations.formula: COUNT(responses WHERE polarity > 0.1) / COUNT(all responses) * 100
COUNT(responses WHERE -0.1 <= polarity <= 0.1) / COUNT(all responses) * 100
COUNT(responses WHERE polarity < -0.1) / COUNT(all responses) * 100

column_details.column: What improvements would you like to see in these cultural funding programs?
Do you have any additional ideas, concerns, or feedback you would like to share to help ACME better serve the public?

calculations.formula:
COUNT(responses WHERE "Prior to this survey, were you aware of the following programs administered by the City of Austin/ACME? 
(Select all that you are aware of; checkboxes for each program) " CONTAINS "Heritage") / COUNT(all responses) * 100

COUNT(responses WHERE "Prior to this survey, were you aware of the following programs administered by the City of Austin/ACME? 
(Select all that you are aware of; checkboxes for each program) " CONTAINS "Thrive") / COUNT(all responses) * 100

COUNT(responses WHERE "Prior to this survey, were you aware of the following programs administered by the City of Austin/ACME? 
(Select all that you are aware of; checkboxes for each program) " CONTAINS "Nexus") / COUNT(all responses) * 100

COUNT(responses WHERE "Prior to this survey, were you aware of the following programs administered by the City of Austin/ACME? 
(Select all that you are aware of; checkboxes for each program) " CONTAINS "Elevate") / COUNT(all responses) * 100

COUNT(responses WHERE "Prior to this survey, were you aware of the following programs administered by the City of Austin/ACME? 
(Select all that you are aware of; checkboxes for each program) " CONTAINS "AIPP") / COUNT(all responses) * 100

COUNT(responses WHERE "Prior to this survey, were you aware of the following programs administered by the City of Austin/ACME? 
(Select all that you are aware of; checkboxes for each program) " CONTAINS "CSAP") / COUNT(all responses) * 100

COUNT(responses WHERE "Prior to this survey, were you aware of the following programs administered by the City of Austin/ACME? 
(Select all that you are aware of; checkboxes for each program) " CONTAINS "ALMF") / COUNT(all responses) * 100
COUNT(responses WHERE text CONTAINS ['cost', 'expensive', 'afford', 'money', 'financial', 'budget', 'funding']) / COUNT(responses with text) * 100
COUNT(responses WHERE text CONTAINS ['transport', 'parking', 'drive', 'bus', 'distance', 'travel']) / COUNT(responses with text) * 100
COUNT(responses WHERE text CONTAINS ['know', 'aware', 'heard', 'information', 'communication', 'find out']) / COUNT(responses with text) * 100
COUNT(responses WHERE text CONTAINS ['time', 'schedule', 'busy', 'hours', 'when']) / COUNT(responses with text) * 100
COUNT(responses WHERE text CONTAINS ['location', 'where', 'venue', 'place', 'far']) / COUNT(responses with text) * 100
COUNT(responses WHERE text CONTAINS ['language', 'spanish', 'english', 'translate']) / COUNT(responses with text) * 100
COUNT(responses WHERE text CONTAINS ['child', 'kids', 'babysit', 'family']) / COUNT(responses with text) * 100
COUNT(responses WHERE text CONTAINS ['accessible', 'disability', 'wheelchair', 'ada']) / COUNT(responses with text) * 100
